update UserInfo set
UserName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Mobile =#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Source = #{source,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsAuthMTZ= #{isAuthMTZ,jdbcType=BIT},
IsAuthAE= #{isAuthAE,jdbcType=BIT},
AuthAEUserID =#{authAEUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SysUserID = #{sysUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EmployeeNumber =#{employeeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status =#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LastUpdateTime =#{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LastUpdateUserID =#{lastUpdateUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER} where UserID =#{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select UserID, UserName, Mobile, Pwd, Email, Type, Source, IsAuthMTZ, IsAuthAE, AuthAEUserID, SysUserID, EmployeeNumber, Status, CreateTime, CreateUserID, LastUpdateTime, LastUpdateUserID from UserInfo where UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
